name: On Thin Ice!
description:
A submission for the Games for Change Student Challenge 2019, made by Benicio Ladines and Thomas Cavalluzzi

CONTROLS:

Left arrow & Right arrow / A & D = Move left and right

Up arrow / W = Interact

Down arrow / S = Slide on your belly!

(If you encounter any problems R will reset the game, leaving a comment about it helps too!)
